page.title: 01KEMBERTON
page.content: Kemberton Parish is in the west of the County of Shropshire about 9km from Telford. The settlement of Kemberton is located to the west of the parish at a height of about 107 metres above sea level. It has about 90 houses and a population of about 250. The village has developed on a linear fashion along the route connecting it to the small settlement of Evelith to the east and the B4379 in the west.To the south west is the village of Brockton and to the south east the hamlet of Grindle. The surrounding land is gently undulating and the main geographical divide is the valley containing the Wesley Brook which runs from north to south. The main economic activity in the area is farming.
